name: Stolen Streets
description:
UPDATE: extra level added, animations fixed and levels modified.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Up arrow or S: Jump
Left and Right arrow: Move
D: Attack
A or Shift: Run
E: Grab

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programmers: Rodrigo Diaz Klipphan, Benjamín Llauró, Morena Montero

Level Designers: Benjamin Llauró (Level 1 and Level 3), Morena Montero (Level 2)

Artists: Lautaro Delfino Echagüe (Characters and tiles), Ivan Segovia (Enemies and Logo), Federico Agustin Salazar Riquelme (Background)

Music: Federico Agustin Salazar Riquelme (Levels), Franco Xzequiel Burgos (Character Select, Instructions), Santiago Casares (Credits)

SFX: Nicolas Lopez

Special Thanks: Ariel Cid, Micaela Pereyra, Tomas Borro, Lautaro Maciel
